verbs.description: “ You [V: do] n’t want a criminal attorney , you want a criminal attorney . ” That ’s the line from Better Call Saul and it seems to have sprung to life in the body of Trump ’s personal attorney , Michael Cohen . Rolling Stone did an investigation that reveals Cohen ’s long history as an ambulance - chasing involvement with insurance scams run by — …
